sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 28, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Golf course trails, Hawk Hills and Coyote Run, were rolled on January 24, 2025.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.  All other trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 25th and 26th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: If you’re looking for a sign that you should get out here before bucks opens this is it.  Variable conditions, rolled trail is harder packed and very thin south of clubhouse. North side is better coverage.  Some good crust on fairways.  Worth it for classic at least.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: The Nubs upper loops are in great  shape with a fresh big groom this morning. LF 7 was the perfect wax of today .

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open. We are recovering from the windstorm yesterday by picking sticks off the trail and grooming. Trails should be in pretty good shape by this afternoon.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a calm start to the morning with a very light breeze. Three inches of snow landed at Nub's Nob last night and conditions continue to be mid-winter excellent. The forecast is predicting a few more inches of snow this afternoon. The snow total for the season has just exceeded the amount of snow we received all of last winter and it's not even February. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break at 5:30 PM so we can prepare for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
